```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(extrafont)
```


```{r}
better_train <- readRDS("./better_train.rds")
udata <- better_train
```

```{r}
users <- udata %>% 
  group_by(user_id) %>% 
  summarise(age = first(age), gender = first(gender))
```


```{r}
ggplot(users, aes(x = age, fill = gender)) + geom_histogram(binwidth = 5) +
  theme_gray() + scale_fill_manual(values=c("#00bf7d", "#00b0f6")) +
  xlab("Age")

musers <- users %>% 
  filter(gender == "M")

fusers <- users %>% 
  filter(gender == "F")

ggplot(musers, aes(x = age)) + geom_histogram(binwidth = 5) + theme_gray()
ggplot(fusers, aes(x = age)) + geom_histogram(binwidth = 5) + theme_gray()

```


```{r}
coreusers <- users %>% 
  filter(age >= 18, age <= 35, gender == "M")

fcoreusers <- users %>% 
  filter(age >= 18, age <= 35, gender == "F")

nrow(coreusers)/nrow(users)
nrow(fcoreusers)/nrow(users)
```
